NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
YARROW: Is everyone ready? Using energy from Giant's Deep's electric core, the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> will soon power a 6-second negative time interval to test the mechanisms of the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project!</color>
2
1
PYE: Our apologies for our tardiness, Yarrow! Idaea and I were lost on our way before Poke found us!
3 1
IDAEA: Yarrow, a memory statue aboard the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> paired with me just now, and memories from a previous cycle were transmitted back to me. Does this mean that the project.. succeeded?
4 3
YARROW: I am glad to hear from you at last, my friends. But.. It appears that the Eye of the Universe has eluded us once again.
5 4
YARROW: Sadly, as predicted, a 6-second flight was nowhere near sufficient to cover the maximum possible distances of the Eye's orbit calculated by the <color=orange>Southern Observatory.</color>
6 5
YARROW: The memory statues were only activated after the probe fired by the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> elapsed 20 billion loops, and began to repeat redundant flight trajectories.
7 6
IDAEA: Though disappointing, this means the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> still succeeded in its foremost priorities; we can now be certain that all mechanics of the negative time interval are theoretically sound and functional.
8 7
PYE: Idaea is correct. Once the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> is complete, we can now be confident in its operation without fear of endangering the star system and ourselves. Have faith, Yarrow!
SS EX1 1
SS EX2 8
SS CONV1 8
